item.description: This is a nice place for a Sunday morning walk.  Afterward, we’ll go nearby for lunch.  Join us!  No charge for walk.  For info, call Corky at 860-558-2058.  Directions:  I-84 to 72E or Rt. 9 to 72W, Exit 7 Corbin Avenue, take Rt. 372W to 1st light, turn right onto West Main Street, at 4th light turn right onto Park Place at Walnut Hill Park sign, go to end, turn right and follow road around to other side of park.  We’ll meet in 2nd larger parking lot on right.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the 2nd parking lot on the other side.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Walk & Lunch
